metadata.title: CVE-2022-38752 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Using snakeYAML to parse untrusted YAML files may be vulnerable to Denialof Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input,an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash bystack-overflow.

criterions.comment: snakeyaml package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
